name: URL
description: As part of this data store, metrics related to Hits (Edge), Volume (Edge), Viewing Time, Clip Play Time and Edge Responses are available by dimensions like Device, OS, Player Id. Data is available at a minimum granularity of 1 day.

dimensions.name: Time
dimensions.description: Indicates the time at which content was consumed. Akamai automatically sets this dimension.
dimensions.helpText: Indicates the time at which content was consumed. Akamai automatically sets this dimension.

dimensions.name: CPCode
dimensions.description: Content Provider Code (CPCode) is an identifier assigned to a contract and used for reporting, billing and monitoring traffic served.
dimensions.helpText: Content Provider Code (CPCode) is an identifier assigned to a contract and used for reporting, billing and monitoring traffic served.

dimensions.name: File Size Bucket
dimensions.description: The number of bytes and the size of objects requested categorized in buckets of various sizes.
dimensions.helpText: The number of bytes and the size of objects requested categorized in buckets of various sizes.

dimensions.name: Device
dimensions.description: Indicates the browser, applications or device used to consume the content. This information is derived from the user-agent information in the request.
dimensions.helpText: Indicates the browser, applications or device used to consume the content. This information is derived from the user-agent information in the request.

dimensions.name: OS
dimensions.description: The operating system using which the viewer accesses your media.
dimensions.helpText: The operating system using which the viewer accesses your media.

dimensions.name: Network Type
dimensions.description: The network connection type used by end users to consume the content.
dimensions.helpText: The network connection type used by end users to consume the content.
